DOC.brief_summary: The study design randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , multi centre study compare perception tolerability investigational product comparator . In randomized part study subject give either LoFric Primo ( POBE ) comparator LoFric Primo ( PVC ) use 4 week . The hypothesis subject perception satisfaction POBE equal good PVC .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Fully-blinded Parallel Groups Study Catheter Materials Used Clean Intermittent Catheterisation
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Males females age 18 year Experienced user LoFric Primo minimum one month use Practice CIC LoFric Primo least 3 time per day Adults able read , write understand information give regard study Ongoing symptomatic UTI Suspicions possible poor compliance CIC study period Previous enrolment randomisation treatment present study Pregnancy Subjects able perform selfcatheterisation
